title: GoodScriber
description: GoodScriber – An AI-powered language learning tool that enhances listening and speaking skills. It converts audio and video into subtitles, generates realistic speech from text, and offers a shadowing mode for hands-free pronunciation practice. Users can choose between the Recording mode for fluency training and the Interval mode for listening repetition. GoodScriber supports custom uploads and provides a rich library of audiobooks, podcasts, and exam exercises.
